text: **WHEN DRAWN:** If you are playing an Incursion mission, or if there are fewer than three units from your army on the battelfield, you can discard this card and draw a new Secondary Mission card.

content.title: Recover assets (action)
content.units: Two or more units from your army, if each of those units is wholly within a different one of the following areas: your deployment zone; No Man's Land; your opponent's deployment zone.
content.completes: End of your turn, if either two of three of those units are on the battlefield.

text: **WHEN:** End of your turn or the end of the battle (whichever comes first).
Two of your units **recovered assets** this turn.
Three of your units **recovered assets** this turn.
